channel.title: Sad News for Producers - Best Buy stops selling CDs
channel.description:
Guys we'll never be able to sell our music now :sob: ![image|333x250](upload://q5ZbnKyG7ikzvtzhvfBN1ZmNQ80.jpg)
We can't sell our CDs at Best Buy any longer. We need to have a serious discussion about our alternatives.

item.title: Sad News for Producers - Best Buy stops selling CDs
item.dc:creator: nep
item.description:
Computers don’t even have CD players anymore. Why don’t you sell your stuff online?

item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Yo as a side note, does anyone else go to Best Buy with the idea of buying something and just walk out totally empty handed? The last four times I’ve been in there for various things (headphones, various computer equipment) I was just so underwhelmed that I left.

I don’t know why I keep going in there, literally every time it’s just such

item.title: Sad News for Producers - Best Buy stops selling CDs
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Great little documentary short.

I have a Strymon El Capistan dTape pedal which does a nice job of aging / ‘tape-ifying’ stuff, though not quite BoC levels. I really should use it more.

If I’m starting to mess about more with LoFi, that tape feel is definitely something I’ll be exploring more.

Read full topic

item.title: Sad News for Producers - Best Buy stops selling CDs
item.dc:creator: Sunny
item.description:
Film didn’t die when it went to DVD. Film didn’t die when it went to streaming services.

Personally enjoy the globalised approach to distribution.

Will miss people harassing you to listen to their mixtape outside of Kmart tho.
